title: Plan your next project more efficiently with this $99.99 Microsoft combo
content:
Macworld

Good software can make all the difference for any professional, and Microsoft has been refining theirs for years. Now, new users can set up a new, older, or refurbished Windows device with everything they need to see a project through with this all-in-one Microsoft bundle. It boasts Microsoft basics like an OS upgrade and productivity apps, plus a few extras specifically tailored to project management for under $100.

First, users will get lifetime access to Windows 11 Pro, Microsoft’s latest and greatest OS. Enjoy enhanced productivity tools like snap layouts and customizable widgets, innovative security measures like Smart App Control and BitLocker Encryption, and even a boost from AI through Copilot, your new Windows assistant.

You’ll also get MS Office 2019 Pro Plus, which includes 2019 versions of Word, PowerPoint, OneNote, Outlook, Excel, Publisher, and Access. There are also two bonus additions to this Microsoft bundle, which may be especially attractive for project-oriented professionals.

Visio Pro 2019 and Project Pro 2019 round out this bundle. Visio offers project-focused users diagramming tools like flow charts, org charts, floor plans, and more. Meanwhile, Project provides automated scheduling tools, built-in reports, what-if scenario generation, and auto-population for enhanced project efficiency.

Gain a productivity boost with this all-inclusive Microsoft bundle featuring Microsoft Office Pro Plus 2019, Windows 11 Pro, Project Pro 2019, and Visio Pro 2019 for just $99.99.

 

The All-in-One Microsoft Bundle featuring: Microsoft Office Pro Plus 2019, Windows 11 Pro, Project 2019, and Visio 2019

$99.99 through Macworld

StackSocial prices subject to change.
